Package org.gradle.nativeplatform

Interface Tool

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PreprocessingTool
    @Incubating
public interface Tool
    Configuration of the arguments of a ToolChain executable.

      Adds a number of arguments to be passed to the tool.
